thread.title: DEAL & 400ml Brings Some Graffiti Inspiration to the New Balance 997.5
thread.title_full: DEAL & 400ml Brings Some Graffiti Inspiration to the New Balance 997.5

author: Hypebeast (info@hypebeast.com)
title: DEAL & 400ml Brings Some Graffiti Inspiration to the New Balance 997.5
text:
Earlier this week, graffiti crew 400ml rang in the new year by joining forces with The Remade for a custom rendition of the Air Jordan 4 . Now the collective is moving on from custom kicks to an official collab as it puts its stamp on the New Balance 997.5. Taking on the retro runner for an exclusive release at Chinese sneaker spot DEAL, 400ml's NBs take cues from Tianjin clay figurine Zhang and sport a combination of tan, black, red and yellow and even come with a removable heel wrap sporting 400ml's graffiti work.
Fans can expect the kicks to begin rolling out to retailers on January 16 following their January 15 DEAL debut.
Click here to view full gallery at Hypebeast.com
